video.title: Roccapia Sangiovese, Chianti, Tuscany, Italy 2007
video.description: In this tasting note, District Sommelier, Caterina Mirabelli is now pouring Roccapia Sangiovese, Chianti, Tuscany, Italy 2007. Aromas and palate of raspberry, cranberry and pomegranate. Medium bodied with elegant tannins on the finish.
